Name: Skyward Atlas
Title: Cloud Atlas: Skyward Atlas
Desc: Its full name is the "An atlas of the winds and clouds."\nThis text records the winds and clouds of the northern lands' skies in poetic and archival forms.

Talent.Name: Skyward Atlas
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once per Round:</color> This character's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 additional DMG.\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
